title: Every solo support and ADC in Dynamic Q

replies.body:
Nothing strikes fear into me more as a support than seeing the bot lane and jungler be a 3 man pre-made. 
You know you're game is gonna suck.

{{champion:67}} Don't worry. We just have to dive them first.
It's a flawless strategy. Completely devoid of any potential drawbacks!
Fight fire with gasoline! The explosion will burn up their entire oxygen supply!
{{champion:89}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} sounds good lets do this at lv 2
{{champion:34}} I'll cut off their escape! Then we'll watch them squirm and writhe in pain muwuhahahahahaha!
You see a 3-man bot/jungle premade, I see free triple-kills.

I see a 4-man bot/jungle/mid pre-made. My ADC sees more chances to get fed. 

I don't know why he keeps trying to 2v4 but it's getting us both killed.
r/KoreanAdvice
{{champion:82}} You mean a free ghost every 2 minutes? HUEHUEHUE!

keep DinaQ disabled till rito adds voice chat in league

premades communication is such a huge advantage over the enemy team that is just 5 solo players, especially early on and rito made us a huge favor increasing wards cd

lol= play with a team or dont play at all
God no no voice chat. I don't need some 10 year old asking me for tit pic's or calling everyone under the sun a %%%%%%bitch%%%got%%%%fuckshitpenis because they think it makes them "cool".
People so paranoid about an optional choice. Its not like anyone can force you, why is everyone so scared of voice chat?

It's not voice chat.
It is the *community* they are scared of.

If people truly feared the LoL community then they wouldn't play LoL with said community and I personally still see the better sides of it. So its an **optional** voice chat with the community they play with anyhow that they are scared of. Also you would be surprised just how much the people who are toxic become total wusses when voice chat is involved. Sometimes it actually cuts down on the toxicity present while giving better communication. Also there is always the mute button. for each and every player which is already in the game.
Therefore I don't see why at least making the possibility a thing is something people fear.

TLDR: Makes no sense to me. If riot could put in dynamic queue don't see why this is such a stretch.

The issue is that when a communication tool like voice chat is integrated into the game platform itself if you want to succeed it is no longer an option you have to use it to do well. How many games have you won in the last week where you didn't ping once. Pinging is an option but to succeed you have to use it. Never mind that adding a voice chat system would increase the amount of data being communicated between your computer and the host by a significant amount so it would increase ping and drop fps for the community as a whole with out a significant increase in riots infrastructure.

This doesn't really apply when so many people seem not to want to use it and the dynamic queue system already means that a lot of the people who do, already are. The ping system is necessary because it was the bare necessity for a game of pace like LoL. However even with a voice chat system, the ping system is still a great means of communication and would still be viable. Heck its faster in some ways than a voice system as that's mainly for planning. Also considering how so many other game's with similar or even weaker infrastructures behind them succeed in having a voice chat system without breaking things i don't see how that's a problem for a big company like Riot. Its especially so for FPS when even 3rd party systems which have to be running over the game itself still provide satisfactory performance without many problems, having it directly integrated means those such problems would be even less prominent.
Yeah please don't add voice chat. I really enjoy playing LoL from the months June to September.

I know it seems impossible, but there are other kinds of people playing lol, surprising right?

Just mute those you dont want to hear and move on....

So much this (except the play with a team or don't play at all statement). Would solve a good few of the premade verses pure soloq matchups. Also for all the ppl scared of it just make it optional, no problem then. Its annoying when you have to not only be willing to startup whatever 3rd party problem but your team also have to have that same program and be using it.
A lot of people who use certain 3rd party programs would never allow LoL people to know their skype and then not everyone has that program and not everyone wants to download it just for this one game or some people have potatoes or toasters and don't want something else running in the background (especially knowing how league freaks out when interacting with 3rd party software, whether because of the 3rd party or league)

Its supposed to be a team game in the first place.
https://45.media.tumblr.com/b1327761ee9a5ba367e91007a0a1dbf7/tumblr_nvhr9fUcWu1sbg8gso1_500.gif
Even if there isn't a 4man, you should expect this. I've played bot since season 1 and I have to say bot lane has been getting gangbanged for years.
The sad part is, my team is never the team to gangbang their bot lane.
As a support main, nothing strikes more fear into my heart than seeing the same club tag on every opponent
i always type when i see same club or names that are similar: we all know you're premade, but plz dont rape us
This is why I play janna.
Johnney Depp in his only normal portrayal in his entire career, giving me advice on League. *Sniff*{{champion:32}}

Meanwhile in mid:

Sweet! My laner just went through the bottom brush! Time to B and buy some items ^__^

Meanwhile in top:

Welp, my laner TP'd bot and I pinged... I've done all I can do... guess I better just back while he's not here to interrupt it
what is the adc doing with a {{item:3108}}
The pain is so real. ;-;
What is going on here... league being played the way it was designed to be played? With teamwork?? Hell no, dynamic que ruined league!

> [{quoted}](name=ZGM Permabanned,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TkMLoaTB,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-29T02:30:19.665+0000)
>
> What is going on here... league being played the way it was designed to be played? With teamwork?? Hell no, dynamic que ruined league!

League is sometimes meant to be played as purely a team game and it is... in a competitive setting

Ranked's ELO system doesn't work for dynamic Q. It is supposed to be an indicator of your personal skill whereas dynamic Q makes it possible to be carried while not deserving to be at an elo (not to mention teams with more solo players are at a huge disadvantage because of communication)

> [{quoted}](name=ZGM Permabanned,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TkMLoaTB,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-29T02:30:19.665+0000)
>
> What is going on here... league being played the way it was designed to be played? With teamwork?? Hell no, dynamic que ruined league!

Being able to play in a favorable teamwork environment is great.

Pulling a one-sided game because you have an intrinsic advantage that the other team can't match isn't that great.

That's why the Dynamic Q is considered a joke of competitivity - blending together radically different things on the same ladder isn't going to work no matter how hard you try.

Why cant the other team match it if they also have a group of 4. Thats their fault for not bieng able to communicate. It the same luck as solo que, sometimes you get bad teammates. People just always need something to blame for losing games.

> [{quoted}](name=AIIan,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TkMLoaTB,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-03-29T03:09:55.111+0000)
>
> Being able to play in a favorable teamwork environment is great.
> 
> Pulling a one-sided game because you have an intrinsic advantage that the other team can't match isn't that great.
> 
> That's why the Dynamic Q is considered a joke of competitivity - blending together radically different things on the same ladder isn't going to work no matter how hard you try.

QFT.  The issue isn't that there can be more team work... it's that one side gets the team work and the other side doesn't.  In other words, when you're the one solo que going up against a premade.  As the original poster is making a joke about it I think they hit the problem spot on.

If I'm mid, and I see that mid, top, and their jg are also a premade I expect to get camped by them for the next 20 minutes straight especially if the top laner is a shen or pantheon.  That isn't indicating skill levels (when it happens to anyone), it just indicates how well you can get a group together to cheese the people who are not grouped.

I thought it wouldn't be so bad if it matched premades to other premades, but I've had several full team solo que games against 4 and 3 man premades as well as those games where you get the premade that just feeds in every lane and feel like there's nothing you can do.

I've also been the JG in a game where there was a trio on either side, and their trio invaded my JG in waves every 2 minutes and our trio BM'ed me by also taking our own JG camps.  One of them even last hit one I was already killing then spammed laugh command.  Everyone fed except our mid. :/
You forgot the toxic adc.
Yup that happened to me last night I was {{champion:236}} with {{champion:89}} supp we were a duo premade there mid and jg was in our lane every other minute
This is the reason why I despise Dynamic Q

Whenever I am afraid of a dive heavy team comp I always pick Morgana or Lissandra. Both of them shut down tower dives so quick and it's so fun to watch the enemies assassin's rage when they get constantly shut down when diving.

First person view of being 4 man (dog?) tower dove.

http://i.imgur.com/1Gydk2h.gifv
Nothing to worry here, most of the times i give my adc 2-3 kills before one of us die or we escape.

But those 5-man bot ganks though.... Three games in a row that's what happened to me the other day :P luckily my adcs and I were able to stall out our tower losses (with the help of our jungler) while top and mid took free farm/forced down other towers. all solo games, too :P
This literally happens to me every game as an adc because our jg refuses to help bot lane.
oh playing Sona i expect junglers to come gank the poo low HP Sona. lel.. its funny when i dont die and they waist resources on me .
Yay Dynamic Queue, thanks soooo much Riot!!!!111
